Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
maple: restart: G(x):=x^4/(1-x)^5: f[0]:=G(x): for n from 1 to 18 do f[n]:=diff(f[n-1],x) od: x:=0: seq(f[n],n=4..18);# [_Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 01 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
